ToCollection.summary: Create typed collection from deserialized JavasScript array.

Clone.summary: Creates a clone of this object.

Add.summary: Creates and adds the item to the list.

AddObject.summary: Adds the supplied item to the list.

Remove.summary: Removes the the object which matches the data values.

Retrieve.summary: Retrieves the object which matches the data values.

RetrieveAtIndex.summary: Retrieves the object at the supplied index.
RetrieveAtIndex.returns: The item at the supplied index.

GetIndex.summary: Gets the index of the object which matches the data values.

PropertyNames.summary: Gets an array of property names.

SelectItems.summary: Gets the items that match the supplied names.
